fullText: Despite Bobby Cannavale's powerhouse performance as the tormented movie star Charlie Castle, this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 melodrama about Hollywood corruption feels surprisingly airless and dated.
dtliExcerpt: Despite Bobby Cannavale's powerhouse performance as the tormented movie star Charlie Castle, this revival of Clifford Odets' 1949 melodrama about Hollywood corruption feels surprisingly airless and dated.
